content: this is a crochet pattern for a tapestry crochet basket in english and in spanish this crochet pattern is suitable for beginners who are familiar with tapestry crochet if you will use relatively thin yarn like i did the bottom of your basket will not be very firm the pattern includes 1 written instructions in us terms 2 abbreviations used 3 links to the photo tutorials on my website www nordichook com for all the stitches used in this project 4 pattern notes 5 photo instructions showing the main steps how to make a basket 6 a color chart and explanations how to read it materials you will need any thin yarn i used strik & smil art silk garn 100% viscose 50 g white and green crochet hook size recommended on your yarn label i used size 2 0 tapestry needle optional a piece of transparent mousse cake film or a few stripes of paper to make the edge of the basket more firm measurements diameter 12 5 cm height 3 0 cm not folded 6 0 cm you can purchase a pdf pattern at the nordic hook shop here 1 join nordic hook club to get all ad-free patterns stitch tutorials and e-books in pdf format here 2 1 https //nordichookshop com/products/tapestry-crochet-basket-wave 2 https //nordichookclub com/sign-up/ copyright information this pattern remains the copyright of nordic hook it is for personal use only not to be copied distributed or sold you may create items using this pattern and sell them with credit to nordic hook copyright 2021 © nordic hook nordic hook information website https //nordichook com/ facebook https //www facebook com/nordichook/ pinterest https //www pinterest dk/nordichook/ instagram https //www instagram com/nordic_hook/
